narrative:
A focused inspection was conducted to address the non-compliant item of  2.40 (b) (2) involving the dogs Mildred
(m/c# 033-810-365 ) and Shades (m/c # 0A02130730) from the October 15, 2014 inspection report.  
Both dogs have been examined and treatment prescribed by a veterinarian. Documentation from examination and
treatment was available for review.  Observation of dogs showed improvement in both of the dogs.
This focused inspection and exit briefing were conducted with a facility representative.
 
Additional Inspectors
Plumlee Konnie, Supervisory Animal Care Specialist
